channel.description: CC 410 - Week 2 Wrapping Up Module 1 Hello Real World Final Project 1 This Week Module 2: OOP OOP Example Restaurant 1 Updates Discord Channel https://discordbot.cs.ksu.edu Grading - Rubric on Canvas Code Comments on GitHub So far, so good?
